dependencyNotes.nuxt-viewport: Module that detects screen breakpoint, used by Mochahost banner
dependencyNotes.vitest: Lightning-fast unit test framework powered by Vite. Used for component and utility function testing with hot module reloading support.
dependencyNotes.@vue/test-utils: Official Vue 3 testing utility library. Provides component mounting, DOM queries, event simulation, and mocking capabilities for Vue components.
dependencyNotes.@vitest/coverage-v8: Code coverage reporting for Vitest. Generates coverage reports to track test effectiveness and identify untested code paths.
dependencyNotes.jsdom: JavaScript implementation of web standards (DOM, HTML). Provides a fake browser environment for Vitest to run DOM-dependent tests without a real browser.
dependencyNotes.@playwright/test: End-to-end testing framework by Microsoft. Used for critical user workflow testing in real browsers (Chromium, Firefox, WebKit) with cross-browser support.
